markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Mantis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=295)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These massive cousins of normal praying mantises stand taller than an average human. They stalk through dense forests, striking at meals from the trees.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Giant Mantis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=295)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 233</row>

**Perception** +9; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 40

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet, fly 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
leg +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+5 piercing plus Grab

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +12,
**Damage** 1d12+5 piercing

**Deadly Mandibles** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** The giant mantis Grabs a creature with its leg. **Effect** The mantis pulls the creature adjacent to it, then makes a mandibles Strike against the creature.

**Lunging Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The giant mantis lunges forward, making a leg Strike with an extended reach of 20 feet.

**Sudden Strike**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven’t acted are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the giant mantis.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-72" />
name: Giant Mantis
